xwikidoc.title: Meetings Translations
xwikidoc.content:
### Missing: contrib.meeting.home.presentation=Welcome to the XWiki Meeting Application. Create your own meeting by clicking on "Add New Entry". You can also check out a [[**Calendar**>>Meeting.CalendarView]] of all the meetings.

### Missing: contrib.meeting.app.title=Meetings ### Missing: contrib.meeting.home.title=Meetings ### Missing: contrib.meeting.calendarView=Calendar View ### Missing: contrib.meeting.calendarView.title=Calendar View ### Missing: contrib.meeting.calendarView.noMacro.admin=To display the calendar view of the meetings, you need to install the Full Calendar Macro on this wiki : ### Missing: contrib.meeting.calendarView.noMacro.noAdmin=We are missing the macro displaying the calendar view. Ask this wiki administrator to install the "FullCalendar" Macro.

Possible values are "show" and "hide".
